modName: Riverwood Riverside Shack with Altar of Azura
summary: Add a small house in the village of Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
About this MOD
---------------

Add a small house in the village of Riverwood.

• Where is the other side of the sawmill, is closer to the upstream.

· We have established a blast furnace units and chopping wood on the side of the house.
We build a bridge of home from the sawmill near also. (Deployed navmesh)

Interior has free and easy resources to help you Merryfair Farm .
Are equipped with tool-die alchemy enchant some storage and cooking pot.
On the one shelf and two shelves of Enchantment underground deer side wall first floor is made on the bookshelf.

• There is a side altar of Azura to bed underground.
Has the effect of (up 10% less HP natural recovery time 8) \"Blessing of Azura\" and treatment of disease and you want to activate.



Configuration file
------------

RwRSS Azura.esp
readme (j).txt
readme (e).txt



How to install and uninstall
----------------------------------

Please put the Data folder \"RwRSS Azura.esp\" installation.
Uninstall and when to move the item was stored in the building,
Please delete the file from the same turn off the effect of Blessing of Azura.
Also carried out after the deletion, please wait hours of Respawn if possible.



Re-modification and distribution
----------------

-Limit is not specifically provided. Thank you gotten to redistribute modifications and freely.
When re-distributing, after modification, please specify the changes to.

Assurance issues and for damages caused by defects, such as your environment and can not be.
Please acknowledge it beforehand.


Other
--------
English is using translation software.
If you do not know exactly what you well, please refer to the readme the Japanese version.


Update History
